name: Second Chance: a 2nd person horror game
name_original: Second Chance: a 2nd person horror game
description:
You take a deep breath and wince from the sharp pain in your head. You slowly open your eyes, keeping them squinted till they adjust to the light.

Where... where am I? You think to yourself as you look around the room. Your worries and fears intensify as you notice security cameras in the corners.

"Nola sweetie." A familiar voice plays loudly from a speaker in the room. You try to remain calm.
